3-5.text: How often does the child engage in parallel play with peers?
Rate the child's eye contact during interaction (1-10)

6-8.text: Does the child initiate group play or conversations?
Can the child maintain friendships over time?

9-12.text: Does the child participate in team activities or clubs?
How well does the child resolve conflicts with peers?

13+.text: Rate the child's confidence in social situations (1-10)
How well does the child build and maintain close friendships?
